evidence.text:
Person A: Well, Eminence, I’d say this is a pretty fair vision of hell.
Person B: Don’t be blasphemous, Ray. Hell arrives tomorrow when we bring in the cardinals.
Person B: How on earth does one pronounce this? Salso?

Person B: I don’t think that’s possible. The cardinals will begin arriving in an hour. What’s it about?
Person B: We’re going to be sequestered from six o’clock. He should have come earlier.
Person A: Yes, your Eminence. I’ll tell him.
Person B: Ray? Tell him I’ll see him after I’ve met the cardinals. The poor fellow will be worrying about his future. O’
Person B: That would be too much to hope for.

Person B: If we’ve left someone off the list...
Person A: That’s what I thought, Eminence. But Archbishop Mandorff has spoken to him and thinks not.
Person B: He h as to be an imposter, surely?

Person A: Dean, your homily... I’m not entirely clear whether or not it should be placed in the Vatican archive or not? As it was not the homily you... actually... delivered?
Person A: Not at all, Your Eminence. It has caused quite a stir. I don’t think anyone expected you to... to...

Person B: On health grounds? Look into that will you Ray? Kind of thing the press like to get hold of.
Person A: I spoke to Monsignor Morales. He was emphatic that he knows of no reason why Cardinal Tremblay should not be Pope.
Person B: Thank you.
Person A: However, will you forgive me if I say that I did not entirely believe the good monsignor?
Person A: He was just... so emphatic? My Spanish is quite poor and I may have... accidentally... given him the impression that you had seen a document that contr adicted that? And he said you weren’t to worry about that. His exact words were - “El informe ha sido retirado.”
Person B: A “report?” A report on what? Withdrawn when?
Person A: That I couldn’t say, Eminence.
Person A: Good morning, Your Eminence. Did you sleep well?

Person A: Forgive me. I know you said we should forget the matter of the withdrawn report but...I wondered in light of Cardinal Tremblay’s present...position? I could see if there was anything more I could find out?
Person B: I’m sorry, Ray. No more investigations. I think we’ve heard enough secrets. Let God’s Will be done.

Person A: Everyone has been taken to the Casa Santa Marta, Your Eminence. No one was seriously hurt. Some cuts, that’s all.
Person B: And outside? In the city? How bad is it?
Person A: Your Eminence? The Conclave? Do we continue?
Person B: Complete privacy, Willi.
Person B: No. But it’s wonderful all the same.

Person B: I found out... Switzerland. Cardinal Benitez’ trip to Switzerland.
Person A: A clinic for what?
